p: Mental health is intricately linked with physical health.[ 53 54] Poor physical health and ailments can lead to poor quality of life and psychological distress.[ 55] Often the psychological distress elicited by medical illnesses do not qualify for a severe psychiatric illness but require the diagnosis of adjustment disorders.[ 56] Nonetheless, the anxiety and depressive symptoms generated as a consequence of physical illness require attention and are helped with treatment with antidepressants and counseling.
